plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange, but also can be found in green
🐇 I am long and crunchy.
🌱 I grow under the ground.

plant.question: I have a trunk and many leaves, and birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very big.
🍃 I give shade on a sunny day.
🐿️ Squirrels climb on me.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I grow from a seed.
💐 You can give me as a gift.
🐝 I need the sun to grow.

plant.question: I am long and green and you can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I am often eaten with dressing.
🥗 I am a healthy snack.
🥪 I am often found in sandwiches.

plant.question: I have a bumpy skin and grow on a vine. You can make juice out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🥤 I can be purple, green or red.
☀️ I need lots of sun to be sweet.

plant.question: I am a big, round vegetable that is orange. People carve faces into me for Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 I have seeds inside.
👻 I am used for decorations in the fall.
🥧 You can make a pie with me.

plant.question: I am tall and yellow and grow in a field. You can pop me to make a yummy snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am often eaten at the movies.
🌽 I grow on a cob.
🌾 Farmers grow lots of me.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful, fragrant flowers. People often give me to someone they love. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 My petals are soft.
❤️ I am a symbol of love.
🥀 Watch out for my pointy parts!

plant.question: I grow in the water and have big, round leaves that float. Frogs like to sit on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I am a pad.
🌸 I can have a beautiful flower.
I live in a pond.

plant.question: I'm a plant that climbs and twists around things, sometimes with pretty flowers, but can be hard to get rid of! What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I can grow up walls!
🌺 Some types have lovely flowers.
🌱 Sometimes, gardeners don't want me around.

food.question: I am yellow and long, monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am a favorite food of monkeys
💛 My skin is yellow and you have to peel it off
🍌 My shape is curved.

food.question: I am round and red, and you can take a bite. Doctors say I keep them away. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I am a popular fruit
🔴 I am usually red or green.
🦷 You can eat me as a snack.

food.question: I am white and cold and yummy. I come in many flavors like chocolate and strawberry. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am a sweet treat
🥶 I am often eaten during hot weather to cool you down.
🥄 You usually eat me with a spoon.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy, rabbits like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny eats me!
🌱 I grow in the ground.
👁️ People say I'm good for your eyes.

food.question: I am long and brown, and you can put ketchup on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I'm often served with burgers.
🥔 I am made from potatoes.
🧂 I taste good with salt.

food.question: I am green or yellow and grow on a tree, and I am sour to eat by myself. What am I?

hints.text: 🍋 I make a funny face if you eat me without sugar
🌳 I grow in warm places.
🍹 You can make lemonade with me.

food.question: I am round and flat, and you can put cheese and sauce on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 You cut me into slices.
🍅 Tomato sauce is my favorite topping.
🔥 I am cooked in the oven.

food.question: I am made from milk, and I can be yellow or white. Mice like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 I can be hard or soft.
🐄 I come from a cow's milk usually.
🥪 I am good in a sandwich.

food.question: I am a colorful dish with rice, chicken, and vegetables all mixed together. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I am a complete meal.
🥘 Some people use special spices to make me delicious
🐔 I can be made with chicken, shrimp or even pork

food.question: I am a drink made from squeezing oranges, and I am good for breakfast. What am I?

hints.text: 🍊 I am made from a citrus fruit.
🥛 You can have me in the morning with your breakfast
🧃 I am a juice.
